text: Lee Mao-san (; born 11 April 1960)若真遇到《無言的結局》李茂山會…… United Daily News 1986年08月08日李茂山明天28歲 United Evening News 1988年04月10日 is a Taiwanese singer and television host. At 19, Lee won first place in a singing competition in 1979. He released his debut album in 1984. Lee won a Golden Melody Award in 1991, followed by a Golden Bell Award in 1993. He left Taiwan in 1999, to avoid gambling debts, and settled in Malaysia and Singapore. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Taiwanese male singers Category:Taiwanese Mandopop singer-songwriters Category:Taiwanese Hokkien pop singers Category:20th-century Taiwanese singers Category:Taiwanese expatriates in Malaysia Category:Taiwanese expatriates in Singapore Category:Taiwanese television presenters Category:20th-century male singers
title: Lee Mao-shan
